Package shapes

Class LineShape

  • java.lang.Object
    • shapes.LineShape
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    RectangleLineShape, StraightLineShape

    public abstract class LineShape
extends java.lang.Object
    A super-class representing the line of the party shape.
    Author:
    Afraz Salim
